Plot: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.
Title: The Year of Living Dangerously
Writer: David Williamson (screenplay), Peter Weir (screenplay), C.J. Koch (screenplay), C.J. Koch (novel)
Actors: Mel Gibson, Sigourney Weaver, Linda Hunt, Michael Murphy
tomatoConsensus: Both a smart, suspenseful tale of intrigue and a sweeping romance, The Year of Living Dangerously features excellent performances from Mel Gibson and Sigourney Weaver as a pair of journalists covering political unrest in Indonesia.
